00014 FirmnessGroup::FirmnessGroup(QWidget *parent):
00015 QGroupBox(tr("Firmness"), parent),
00016 templateBox_(tr("Template"), this),
00017 mutableBox_(tr("Mutable"), this),
00018 parameterizableBox_(tr("Parameterizable"), this),
00019 fixedBox_(tr("Fixed"), this),
00020 options_() {
00021 
00022         QGridLayout* layout = new QGridLayout(this);
00023         layout->addWidget(&templateBox_, 0, 0, 1, 1);
00024         layout->addWidget(&mutableBox_, 0, 1, 1, 1);
00025         layout->addWidget(&parameterizableBox_, 0, 2, 1, 1);
00026         layout->addWidget(&fixedBox_, 0, 3, 1, 1);
00027         layout->setSpacing(0);
00028 
00029         templateBox_.setChecked(true);
00030         mutableBox_.setChecked(true);
00031         parameterizableBox_.setChecked(true);
00032         fixedBox_.setChecked(true);
00033 
00034         connect(&templateBox_, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)),
00035                 this, SLOT(onTemplateChanged(int)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00036         connect(&mutableBox_, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)),
00037                 this, SLOT(onBlockChanged(int)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00038         connect(&parameterizableBox_, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)),
00039                 this, SLOT(onIntegrationChanged(int)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00040         connect(&fixedBox_, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)),
00041                 this, SLOT(onConfigurationChanged(int)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00042 }

00044 FirmnessGroup::~FirmnessGroup() {
00045 }
00046 
00047 void FirmnessGroup::onTemplateChanged( int state ) {
00048         options_.templates_ = Utils::checkBoxState2Bool(state);
00049         emit optionsChanged(options_);
00050 }
00051 
00052 void FirmnessGroup::onBlockChanged( int state ) {
00053         options_.mutable_ = Utils::checkBoxState2Bool(state);
00054         emit optionsChanged(options_);
00055 }
00056 
00057 void FirmnessGroup::onIntegrationChanged( int state ) {
00058         options_.parameterizable_ = Utils::checkBoxState2Bool(state);
00059         emit optionsChanged(options_);
00060 }
00061 
00062 void FirmnessGroup::onConfigurationChanged( int state ) {
00063         options_.fixed_ = Utils::checkBoxState2Bool(state);
00064         emit optionsChanged(options_);
00065 }
